validations.type_of_service_required: Type Of Service field is Required

service1.title: Health Care Providers
service1.text: A healthcare provider is a professional licensed to provide diagnostic and treatment healthcare services, including medications, surgery, and medical devices.

service2.title: Medical Practices
service2.text: The Medical Practice shall include any form of organization in which Services are provided to patients of the Physician Practice or other physicians.

home.text1: Medical Practice Income provides comprehensive solutions for independent medical practices and physician entrepreneurs, allowing physicians to reduce administrative burdens and treat patients more efficiently. Our individualized solutions keep practices running smoothly, streamlining the business and clinical aspects of independently-owned and operated medical practices.

page_about.title: About Medical Practice Income
page_about.text1: Medical Practice Income, Inc. (MPI) provides integrated solutions across various disciplines to meet the needs of today's healthcare practitioners while increasing practice revenue. With more than a decade of expertise in medical licensing, billing, human resources, compliance, and more, the MPI team helps reduce the administrative burdens on medical practices, allowing physicians to do what they do best - treat and heal patients. MPI also supports clients in establishing onsite diagnostic laboratories, compliance documentation, insurance, government payor programs (Medicaid and Medicare), narcotics licenses and DEA compliance, renewals, credential checks, practice operations, marketing, and more. Another synergistic offering that MPI provides is a suite of reimbursable, digital medicine solutions designed to improve clinical outcomes and provide first-class patient care. As a result, doctors no longer have the task of outsourcing this work to multiple agencies and vendors; instead, by working with MPI, these services are provided strategically to give physicians peace of mind that their office is compliant, organized, efficient, and profitable.

page_health_care_providers.title: Services for Health Care Providers
page_health_care_providers.text1: Please complete this form to book your complimentary consultation to examine your particular case and have your licensure-related questions answered. A member of our physician-relations team will contact you within one business day.

section_advantage.title: The MPI Advantage
section_advantage.text1: A high percentage of our clients successfully obtain their medical licenses when working with us. We have been helping health experts integrate into the labor market because our multidisciplinary team is committed to seeing you successfully practice in the United States. Our team works alongside you in each step, from helping you in the process of obtaining proper licensure to establishing and managing a practice.
section_advantage.text2: We're successful because our workflow is methodical, compliant, and transparent. As a result, our clients understand how we work, what laws and regulations apply to their case, and what stage in the process their case is in. We know how medical boards work to the point that we understand that they evaluate.

feature1.title: COMMITMENT
feature1.description: We're committed to ensuring our clients' professional development, allowing them to achieve the possible dream of improved performance in their practice area.

feature2.title: EFFICIENCY
feature2.description: Our team has streamlined the tedious procedures that compliance requires, ensuring fast and reliable results for our clients.

feature3.title: TRANSPARENCY
feature3.description: Our clients feel confident participating in a straightforward process, with understandable, transparent information throughout each step.

section_financial_planning.title: Financial Planning
section_financial_planning.text1: Medical Practice Income offers the industry's most comprehensive, accurate revenue cycle management services. Our services cover as much of the billing process as the client requires. As a result, our clients' collection rates are some of the highest nationwide. In addition, most practices spend considerable human capital managing billing, reworks, and problems associated with the billing. If you're struggling with your revenue cycle management, please schedule a consultation with us for a detailed analysis.

section_health_care_providers.title: Licensing and Credentialing
section_health_care_providers.text1: Our experienced bilingual (Spanish and English) team facilitates the medical licensing and credentialing process on the physician's behalf. We focus on atypical cases (examination and post-graduate training deficiencies), guiding our clients through each step, evaluating procedures, and creating strategies and action plans that favor the licensing process - even when the physician must appear before the Medical Board for appeals.

page_medical_practice_services.title: Practice Management Consulting Services & Personalized Practice Management Plans

section_page.text1: Get in touch! An MPI team member will be happy to answer any questions you may have.

section_team.title2: Scientific and Medical Board of Advisors

footer.text1: provides comprehensive solutions for independent medical practices and physician entrepreneurs, reducing administrative burdens and providing better patient care.
